attributes.additional_details:
We would like the true figure for unemployment, has it is misleading to not count in the people under sactions through the Job Centre Plus.

1  How many people are under sactions from the Department of Work and Pensions and Job Center Plus

2  Why those under sactions are not counted in the figure of the unemployed

We would like to know the true figure for the unemployed with those under sactions added to the figure has they are still unemployed and still have to go and sign on at the Job Centre Plus who works for the DWP
